KiDS-GGL ESD ProductionÂ¶

The first module of kids_ggl allows the user to easily produce galaxy-galaxy lensing measurements around an existing sample of lens galaxies, supplied by the user. Summaries of the process of calculating the galaxy-galaxy lensing signal can be found in Viola et al. (2015) and Dvornik et al. (2017).
